title: Masters experienced coach looking to coach those looking to improve quickly
body: Hey all Mister Lau here, have been coaching for quite a while now and have been quite successful. Looking to take on more students who are serious about improving and climbing the ranks. If interested add me in game for more information.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Mister Lau,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=rrBAddEE,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-02-11T01:14:40.604+0000)
>
> Hey all Mister Lau here, have been coaching for quite a while now and have been quite successful. Looking to take on more students who are serious about improving and climbing the ranks. If interested add me in game for more information.

I could use a coach.
im a mid lane main looking to improve quick too IGN: sùng
hey! i'm a support main looking to improve. :) my IGN is RabbitParachute if you'd like to coach me! thanks
currently doing a session with a student rn, will add all when back on

hi im diamond player for 3 seasons, im really looking to improve.. i was top lane main but am trying to switch to jungle.. its going decent, i have been really looking for a way to get better at the game.. i really want to hit masters.. 

I was a shen main, but feel like i cant get full kit of the champion with solo que, but anyway i would really like to talk with you and see what or where im going wrong 

i will add you tomorrow ! but im serious about trying to get btter and i will listen to what you have to say

Hi! I don't know if it's what you're looking for, but I have a diamond team that could really use a coach, especially of your caliber. I added you in game as well, but let me know if you're interested!
I get camped a lot in top lane should i stop dominating my lane to reduce the camping effect?

> [{quoted}](name=Totalwanabe,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=rrBAddEE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-02-11T01:35:48.130+0000)
>
> I get camped a lot in top lane should i stop dominating my lane to reduce the camping effect?

Try warding, If the enemy is almost always in the bush...Try warding from behind your tower (where the plant is) to play it safe.. Honestly, in Bronze 3 most of the time just playing defensively will get you snowballing because players in that ELO become extremely blood thirsty after a while and will make rediculously stupid mistakes trying to get a kill, and thats where you catch em   *IE:* Enemy tries to tower dive you for some reason because you've been under tower for too long lol

> [{quoted}](name=Mister Lau,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=rrBAddEE,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-02-11T01:14:40.604+0000)
>
> Hey all Mister Lau here, have been coaching for quite a while now and have been quite successful. Looking to take on more students who are serious about improving and climbing the ranks. If interested add me in game for more information.

Yes please! :D
